it.polimi.se2018.utils

Class ServerConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.utils.ServerConfiguration

  • public class ServerConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    The class that contains the information to configure the server. It is a particular singleton, with a method to set the parameters for the first time.
    Author:
    michelemarzollo

    • Method Detail

      • makeInstance

        public static void makeInstance(int portNumber,
                                java.lang.String address,
                                java.lang.String serviceName,
                                int turnDuration,
                                int multiPlayerTimeOut)
        The method that instantiates the class. If it is called when instance is not null it does nothing and ignores the new parameters.
        Parameters:
        portNumber - The number of the port of the server.
        address - The address of the server.
        serviceName - The name of the RMI service.
        turnDuration - The duration of a turn of the match.
        multiPlayerTimeOut - The timeout for multi-player mode.

      • getInstance

        public static ServerConfiguration getInstance()
                                       throws MissingConfigurationException
        The getter of the instance. It shouldn't be called if makeInstance() was never called.
        Returns:
        The instance.
        Throws:
        MissingConfigurationException - if the class parameters aren't already set.

      • reset

        public static void reset()
        Resets the instance to null;
